thread.title: Spirit Airlines adds nonstop link between Las Vegas, New Orleans starting Nov. 13
thread.title_full: Spirit Airlines adds nonstop link between Las Vegas, New Orleans starting Nov. 13 - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Spirit Airlines adds nonstop link between Las Vegas, New Orleans starting Nov. 13
text:
LAS VEGAS, Nev. - Spirit Airlines says it's adding daily nonstop flights between Las Vegas and New Orleans starting Nov. 13.
The nonstop flight is scheduled to leave Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport at 7 a.m. with fares starting at $83 and depart McCarran International Airport near the Las Vegas Strip at 7:50 p.m. with fares starting at $63 based on Nov. 13 flight availability online.
Another route ends the day before Spirit's first nonstop flight between Las Vegas and New Orleans begins.
The airline recently announced it would end nonstop flights between Las Vegas and Arnold Palmer Regional Airport in southwestern Pennsylvania effective Nov. 12.
